titleStmt.title: A declaration by the Committee of Safety of the Common-wealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland, touching the payment of duties of custome and excise. Friday, Decemb. 9. 1659. Ordered, that this declaration be forthwith printed and published. Will. Robinson clerk of the Committee of Safety.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Committee of Safety.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills and John Field, printers to the Committee of Safety,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "xber [i.e. December]", "9ber"; the "9ber" is crossed through.
Title ornament; initial letter; some text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
